message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob. Take a small slice of the pie and let's get this over with!
You were too generous last round, now it's my turn to make a fair offer!
Let's split this more evenly, Bob. We can both walk away happy with a substantial share.
I'll take a slightly larger share this time, but I'm still willing to be fair.
Bob, I'm tired of this back-and-forth.  Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need to see some compromise from you too.
